extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Collects SSH's public key for the interview challenge
extensionAttribute.description: This collects the public ssh key, the hostname and all the IP addresses and stores them in the format of known_hosts
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh MACHINEIPS=`ifconfig | awk '/inet / {print $2}' | grep -v '127.0.0.1' | tr '\\n' ',' | sed 's/,$//'` HOSTNAME=`hostname` DOMAIN=`cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep domain | awk '{print $2}'` if [[ "${HOSTNAME}" == *"${DOMAIN}" ]]; then FQDN="${HOSTNAME}" else FQDN="${HOSTNAME}.${DOMAIN}" fi if [[ -f /etc/ssh_host_rsa_key.pub ]]; then echo "<result>${FQDN},${MACHINEIPS} `cat /etc/ssh_host_rsa_key.pub | sed 's/ *$//'`</result>" fi
